flawed_nl_solution:
Oscar needs to increase his maximum running time from 20 - 2 = <<20-2=20>>20 miles.
Oscar will need a total of 20 / ( 2/3 ) = <<20/(2/3)=30>>30 weeks to prepare.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
